_header: There was a man that had nought
_description: ‘A tale of ryght nought’ — five monorhyming lines

BLEge1995.Transcription:
There was A man that hadde noughtThere come thenys &robbyd hym
                    & toke noughtHe ranne owte and cryde noughtWhy shulde he crye he
                    loste noughtHere ys a tale of ryght noughte
BLEge1995.Note:
Immediately follows colophon to ‘the boke of
                    Curtesy’.
